Article Title: Will Luka Doncic play tonight against the Denver Nuggets? Latest update on the Los Angeles Lakers star's injury report (February 22, 2025)
Article Text:
Is Luka Doncic playing tonight? (Image via Jayne Kamin-Oncea-Imagn Images)

Luka Doncic

Los Angeles Lakers

Is Luka Doncic playing tonight? Los Angeles Lakers injury report for tonight’s game against the Denver Nuggets (February 22, 2025)

Lakers injury report Feb 22 (Image via NBA)

Denver Nuggets injury report (February 22, 2025)?

How to watch the Los Angeles Lakers play tonight against the Denver Nuggets (February 22, 2025)

, the' superstar is marked as "probable" for the highly anticipated matchup against the Denver Nuggets on Saturday, February 22, at Ball Arena. The injury report indicates that Doncic’s status is "injury related," suggesting his availability comes despite the need for rest or maintenance of a physical ailment.The Los Angeles Lakers , holding a 33-21 record, are preparing for a tough battle against the Nuggets, who boast a 37-19 record. While Luka Doncic’s presence on the court is expected, the Lakers are also monitoring LeBron James, who is listed as probable with a foot injury. Maxi Kleber remains out with a foot issue, leaving the team slightly shorthanded.Doncic’s probable status comes as a relief for Lakers fans, as his performance has been pivotal this season. Averaging impressive numbers in points, rebounds, and assists, Luka Doncic’s ability to dominate games makes him a key player in the Lakers' quest for a playoff push. His availability against a stacked Nuggets lineup, led by Nikola Jokic and Jamal Murray, could be the difference-maker in what promises to be a high-stakes showdown.The Nuggets, meanwhile, are dealing with their own injury concerns. Jamal Murray and Aaron Gordon are listed as probable with knee and calf issues, respectively, while Peyton Watson and Vlatko Cancar remain sidelined. DaRon Holmes is out for the season with an Achilles injury. Despite these setbacks, Denver’s depth and Jokic’s MVP-caliber performances have kept them among the league’s elite.The game, scheduled for 8:30 PM ET, will be broadcast on ABC and ESPN+, with live streaming available on Fubo. Fans are eagerly awaiting confirmation on Luka Doncic’s final status, as his presence could tilt the scales in what is shaping up to be one of the most exciting matchups of the season.Also read: Will Nikola Jokic play tonight against the Los Angeles Lakers? Latest update on the Denver Nuggets star's injury report (February 22, 2025) All eyes will be on Doncic and his capacity to perform well under duress as the Los Angeles Lakers and the Denver Nuggets prepare for this matchup. This game might have a big impact on the Western Conference rankings because both teams are vying for a postseason spot. As tip-off draws near, keep checking back for updates.
Article Summary: Luka doncic is listed as "probable" for the los angeles lakers' game against the denver nuggets (february 22, 2025) the slovenian star's status is "injury related," suggesting his availability comes despite the need for rest or maintenance of a physical ailment.

Article Title: NBA Buyout Rumors: Golden State Warriors could potentially sign $4 million ex-NBA star to support Jimmy Butler and Stephen Curry and bolster the squad
Article Text:
Jimmy Butler in Golden State Warriors (Image via Youtube:Chazz NBA)

Golden State Warriors

“It's the defensive end where Beverley built his career though, having earned Defensive Player of the Year votes in five different NBA seasons and earning All-Defensive Team honors three times,”

The, fresh off a roster upgrade by acquiring Jimmy Butler on Feb. 5, now face a gap in their point guard depth after including Dennis Schroder in the multi-team deal. To address this, the Warriors are reportedly eyeing a defensive-minded free agent who could bring stability to their backcourt: Patrick Beverley .Beverley, a 12-year NBA veteran, recently became a free agent after mutually parting ways with Israeli team Hapoel Tel Aviv. Known for his tenacious defense, Beverley has built a reputation as one of the league’s most disruptive on-ball defenders.wrote Blue Man Hoop’s Peter O’Keefe While Patrick Beverley’s offensive contributions have been modest—averaging 6.2 points, 3.3 rebounds, and 2.9 assists last season with the Philadelphia 76ers and Milwaukee Bucks—his defensive prowess could make him a valuable addition to the Golden State Warriors. His career has been distinguished by his ability to hold his own against larger players and disrupt opposing guards. He averaged 6.4 points, 3.1 rebounds, and 0.9 steals per game in 2022, his only season with the Los Angeles Lakers.Patrick Beverley’s journey through the NBA includes stints with seven franchises, most notably the Houston Rockets , Los Angeles Clippers, and Minnesota Timberwolves. His physicality and relentless energy on defense have made him a fan favorite and a respected opponent.The Golden State Warriors would gain a seasoned point guard who may improve their bench defense if they signed Beverley, even though it wouldn't immediately propel them into the running for the championship. In the second half of the season, his expertise and ability to manage game tempo may prove invaluable.The Warriors are trying to bolster their squad, and Patrick Beverley's availability offers a fascinating chance. He might be the missing component to assist Golden State overcome the obstacles in its path because of his defensive mentality and seasoned leadership.Also read: NBA Buyout Rumors: Los Angeles Lakers might want to bag EuroLeague Real Madrid rookie to support LeBron James' and Luka Doncic's Championship push Let us know in the comments below if you feel this could be a smart move from the Golden State Warriors. Should they sign the NBA veteran Patrick Beverley or should the Warriors be on the outlook for someone who synergizes with Stephen Curry , Jimmy Butler , and the rest of the squad, and can be a fitting replacement for Dennis Schroder?
Article Summary: Patrick beverley is a 12-year nba veteran who recently parted ways with hapoel tel aviv. The golden state warriors are reportedly interested in signing beverley. Beverley has earned all-defensive team honors three times. He averaged 6.4 points, 3.1 rebounds, and 0.9 steals per game in 2022.

Article Title: India vs Pakistan, Champions Trophy 2025: Predicted Playing XI, Head to Head Record and Key Players to Watch
Article Text:
India vs Pakistan, Champions Trophy 2025 (Photo Credit: AP/Agency)

Poll Who do you predict will win the India vs Pakistan match? Pakistan India

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

India vs Pakistan: Head-to-Head

Team Matches Wins Losses Draws Tied No Result (NR) Win/Loss Ratio Win % Loss % NR % India 135 57 73 0 0 5 0.78 42.22% 54.07% 3.70% Pakistan 135 73 57 0 0 5 1.28 54.07% 42.22% 3.70%





Predicted Playing XI

India:

Who is this cricketer helping Pakistan prepare for big match vs India | Champions Trophy update from Dubai

Key Players to Watch

Rohit Sharma:

Virat Kohli:

NEW DELHI: India and Pakistan are set to face off in a highly anticipated clash at the ICC Champions Trophy in Dubai on Sunday. This match holds significant importance for both teams in their pursuit of a semi-final berth from Group A.India, led by Rohit Sharma , commenced their campaign with a convincing six-wicket victory over Bangladesh on Wednesday. In contrast, the defending champions, Pakistan, suffered a 60-run loss against New Zealand in the tournament opener in Karachi earlier this week.For Pakistan, this encounter is a must-win situation to keep their semi-final hopes alive, while a win for India would almost guarantee them a spot in the last four of the eight-team event.In their previous ODI meeting during the 2023 World Cup in Ahmedabad, India emerged victorious by seven wickets, with captain Rohit and Shreyas Iyer scoring half-centuries. However, India faced a setback in their encounter against Pakistan in the 2017 Champions Trophy final at The Oval, where they missed out on their second title in the tournament.Also See: India vs Pakistan Head to Head Records Despite this, India hold a psychological edge, having remained unbeaten against Pakistan in their last six ODIs, including the 2023 Asia Cup group stage washout, since 2018.The two teams last met in the 2024 T20 World Cup group stage match in New York, where India emerged victorious by nine runs. Jasprit Bumrah 's impressive figures of 3/14 earned him the Player of the Match award, and India went on to win the title, defeating South Africa in the final to claim their second T20 World Cup trophy after their triumph in 2007.Rohit Sharma (c), Shubman Gill, Virat Kohli, Shreyas Iyer, KL Rahul (wk), Axar Patel, Hardik Pandya Ravindra Jadeja , Mohammed Shami, Harshit Rana, Kuldeep YadavImam-ul-Haq, Babar Azam , Saud Shakeel, Mohammad Rizwan (c/wk), Agha Salman, Kamran Ghulam, Khushdil Shah, Shaheen Afridi, Naseem Shah, Haris Rauf, Abrar AhmedA prolific opener with a knack for big hits, Rohit showed glimpses of his power-hitting abilities against Bangladesh. Known for his experience and leadership are crucial in high-pressure games, the Indian skipper will be aiming to dominate pace and spin alike, making him a game-changer at the top.Known for his hunger for runs, Kohli thrives in chases and high-stakes encounters. Despite undergoing a lean patch in white-ball cricket currently, Kohli remains India's supreme source of temperament, making him one of the most reliable batters in ODI cricket.Having scored a half-century in a losing cause during the tournament opener, Pakistan’s batting mainstay Babar will be looking to pose a threat against India's bowling attack. His ability to anchor an innings and accelerate when needed is vital for Pakistan’s success.A lethal left-arm pacer, Shaheen had a torrid tournament opener against Kiwis. However, his ability to swing the new ball and deliver yorkers at the death makes him a match-winner. His knack for picking up early wickets can put any opposition on the back foot.
Article Summary: India and pakistan face off in the icc champions trophy in dubai on sunday. The match holds significant importance for both teams in their pursuit of a semi-final berth from group a. india are unbeaten against pakistan in their last six odis, including the 2023 asia cup group stage washout, since 2018.

NEW DELHI: Arch-rivals India and Pakistan are set to face each other in a crucial ICC Champions Trophy encounter at Dubai International Stadium on Sunday.India, under Rohit Sharma, began their Champions Trophy campaign strongly with a six-wicket victory over Bangladesh on Wednesday.Defending champions Pakistan, the tournament hosts, however experienced a setback in their opening match, losing to New Zealand by 60 runs in Karachi.Pakistan now face a must win situation to maintain their semis hopes alive while a victory for India would nearly guarantee their progression to the last four in the eight-team tournament.India's last Champions Trophy meeting with Pakistan however ended in disappointment, as they lost the 2017 final at The Oval, missing the opportunity to claim their second tournament title.India currently hold a psychological advantage, remaining undefeated against Pakistan in their last six ODI encounters since 2018, including a rain-affected group stage match in the 2023 Asia Cup.The teams' most recent encounter was during the 2024 T20 World Cup group stage in New York. India emerged victorious with a nine-run win, with Jasprit Bumrah earning Player of the Match honors for his bowling figures of 3 for 14.The India vs Pakistan Champions Trophy Group A match will take place on Sunday, February 23.The India vs Pakistan match will be held at the Dubai International Cricket Stadium in Dubai.The India vs Pakistan game will begin at 2:30 PM IST.The toss for India vs Pakistan ODI will take place at 2:00 PM IST.The coverage of India vs Pakistan ODI will begin from 1:30 PM IST.The India vs Pakistan game will begin at 1 PM in Dubai.Follow all the action from the India vs Pakistan Champions Trophy ODI on TimesofIndia.com
Article Summary: India and pakistan face each other in a crucial icc champions trophy encounter at dubai international stadium on sunday. India, under rohit sharma, began their champions trophy campaign strongly with a six-wicket victory over bangladesh on wednesday.

Article Title: “She doesn’t want to do it”: Taylor Swift will not be performing at the Super Bowl halftime show until Travis Kelce retires
Article Text:
Image via Getty Images

Taylor Swift won't perform at the Super Bowl until Travis Kelce retires

Taylor Swift is considering performing a halftime show for the NFL after her boyfriend Travis Kelce retires, according to a report by the Daily Mail. Swift's decision was influenced by Pepsi's sponsorship and her long-standing partnership with Coca-Cola, as well as her longstanding relationship with the NFL's sponsor, Pepsi. However, it sounds like she’ll wait until his playing days are over before considering taking football’s biggest stage.Taylor Swift has decided not to headline the Super Bowl halftime show until her boyfriend, Kansas City Chiefs star Travis Kelce, retires from football. Despite fans' desire for Swift to take center stage, she remains committed to supporting Kelce on the sidelines.Taylor Swift, who has been dating Kelce for two years, attended the Super Bowl and watched Kendrick Lamar's halftime performance, but is hesitant to accept the role while Kelce remains an active player.“She doesn’t want to do it now until Travis is fully retired as she would like to be at the game supporting him rather than performing at it,” the Daily Mail’s source said. “When she eventually performs at it, she wants all her loved ones to be able to experience it. And as long as Travis is in the league, the Chiefs have a chance to be in the game, so she is going to wait to do it till he is officially done.”Travis Kelce's NFL future remains uncertain after the Chiefs' Super Bowl LIX loss to the Philadelphia Eagles. Rumors about his retirement arose, and he said he would take time to decide on his New Heights podcast with his brother Jason Kelce.“I’m gonna take some time to figure it out,” Kelce said. “And I think I owe it to my teammates that if I do come back that it’s gonna be a wholehearted decision and I’m not half-assing it, and I’m fully here for them. I think I can play, it’s just whether or not I’m motivated or it’s the best decision for me as a man, as a human, as a person to take on all that responsibility.”Also Read: Travis Kelce is rumored to propose to Taylor Swift during their next upcoming romantic vacation Travis Kelce, a key player for the Kansas City offense, has seen a career-low 823 yards and three touchdowns this season. Despite this, his connection with Patrick Mahomes keeps him a key player. The Chiefs have questions about the wide receiver position, but Kelce remains open as defenses focus on him. Kelce is currently going through the offseason and has a puppy with Taylor Swift.
Article Summary: Taylor swift has decided not to headline the super bowl halftime show until her boyfriend, kansas city chiefs star travis kelce, retires from football. Swift's decision was influenced by pepsi's sponsorship and her long-standing partnership with coca-cola, as well as her longstanding relationship with the nfl's sponsor, pepsi.

Article Title: Tyreek Hill's marriage to Keeta Vaccaro sparks sympathy for her among fans amid his children with different women
Article Text:
Image via Kirby Lee-Imagn Images

Tyreek Hill’s Wife Keeta Vaccaro Has A Fan Following That Now Sympathises With Her And Her Marriage



W.A.G.s to Riches | Official Trailer | Netflix

Tyreek Hill’s Mother In Law Has Been Slammed By Fans Due To Her Comments On The Star Player’s Children With Multiple Women



Tyreek Hill , the quarterback of the Miami Dolphins , has been in the news for a lot of controversial reasons related to his personal life. He recently appeared on the Netflix series, “WAGs to Riches” which follows the lives of wives of famous athletes and musicians. Tyreek Hill’s wife, Keeta Vaccaro is a part of that show and now, fans feel sympathy for her.The Netflix show, WAGs to Riches , consists of eight episodes and was shot when Keeta Vaccaro was still pregnant with their daughter. Some scenes with Keeta Vaccaro have raised eyebrows; this includes a scene where Keeta Vaccaro reveals that she is pregnant with her and Tyreek’s first child while the star player has ten children with multiple women.In another scene, Tyreek Hill’s wife, Keeta Vaccaro revealed that their marriage started with “storms” due to media scrutiny over Tyreek’s children with other women. Now fans feel nothing except sympathy for Tyreek Hill’s wife, Keeta Vaccaro.A fan took to X and wrote, “Just finished Wags to Riches.. Alexis and Keeta are my faves, they’re really sweet; Sharelle and Ashley are so unlikable on this show, which is disappointing because Sharelle really is a great business woman #WAGsToRiches”Another fan wrote, “Keeta is so pretty and she seems like such a nice girl. I want better for her #WAGsToRiches”, while a third fan wrote, “I actually really really like keeta you can tell she good folk #WAGsToRiches”Another user commented, “Keeta Hill is very strong for going on #WAGsToRiches and explaining the whole 9 kids thing, and having the 10th baby.. ahh I wouldn’t have said sh*t or even been on the show in the first place 😭 but that must be what strength is”.Neither the star player, Tyreek Hill, nor his wife Keeta Vaccaro have commented on the criticism they have received from fans due to the way their relationship was portrayed on the new Netflix series WAGs to Riches.Many fans have also slammed Keeta Vaccaro’s mother due to a few controversial statements made by her in the last episode of the Netflix show. In the eighth episode, the show features a discussion between Tyreek Hill’s wife Keeta Vaccaro and her mother about the star player’s children. Keeta Vaccaro’s mother says, “being married to an athlete, of course they are gonna have a lotta girlfriends” and this has not gone down well with fans of the couple.While Tyreek Hill does have children with other women, his marriage with Keeta Vaccaro has been pretty smooth and drama free. The two got married in 2023 and welcomed their first child in November 2024.The two did get engaged in 2021 but as revealed by Keeta Vaccaro, they had broken up in between.Also Read: Hailee Steinfeld reveals the "weird" thing that she wants to do about her proposal photo and why she wore her proposal dress as Josh Allen went down on one knee
Article Summary: The netflix show, wags to riches consists of eight episodes and was shot when keeta vaccaro was still pregnant with their daughter. In the eighth episode, the show features a discussion between tyreek hill’s wife keetavaccaro and her mother about the star player's children. The star player has ten children with multiple women.

Article Title: Joe Burrow spotted with a woman who was previously seen with CeeDee Lamb sparking bizarre speculation among fans
Article Text:
Image via Cooper Neill/Getty

Joe Burrow Was Recently Spotted With A Woman Who Was Also Spotted With Ceedee Lamb And Fans Have Questions About It



Joe Burrow Has Kept His Dating Life Pretty Private After He Broke Up With His Ex Girlfriend



Joe Burrow , the quarterback of the Cincinnati Bengals , has a huge fan base among women and many are curious about his personal life, which he mostly likes to keep private. Recently, a picture of him with a woman has gone viral, raising eyebrows. While fans are curious about the woman, but now there is a bizarre speculation going on and it includes CeeDee lambs.Recently, a picture of Joe Burrow has gone viral with Thursday Night Football’s feature reporter Taylor Rooks. The picture is undated and shows the two laughing as they sat next to each other at a high end restaurant. While fans are curious about the nature of their relationship, there is a bizarre speculation going around that Taylor Rooks was “previously with” Ceedee Lambs.A fan took to X and wrote, “Wasn’t she just with CeeDee Lamb?”, while another fan wrote, “Wasnt she just with CeeDee lamb last week??”A third fan wrote, “CeeDee punching air rn”. The reason for this speculation is, just a day before the Super Bowl, Taylor Rooks was spotted with Ceedee Lambs at a party in New Orleans.In the pictures that have gone viral, Ceedee Lamb is dressed in a white graphic T-shirt as he wrapped his arm around Taylor Rooks. Taylor Rooks looked stunning as she wore a black strapless dress and big golden hoops. She kept her short hair open and opted for minimal makeup to complete her look for the night.When the picture of Taylor Rooks with Ceedee Lamb had gone viral, fans were losing their minds over how beautiful they looked together. A fan wrote, “Now that is a beautiful couple!”, while another fan wrote, “If this his gf lamb is winning she’s beautiful let’s go Lamb!”Currently, there is no confirmation if Taylor Rooks is dating either of the NFL players or is just friends with both of them but fans have made up their own stories.As for Joe Burrow, he remains officially single as he has not confirmed any relationship rumours after his relationship with ex girlfriend Olivia Holzmacher ended in 2023. Olivia Holzmacher and Joe Burrow met in college back in 2017 and remained together for a couple of years.She was also spotted cheering on for Joe Burrow many times and there were also rumours about an engagement. As luck would have it, things did not work out between the two and they broke up.Later, Joe Burrow was rumoured to be dating famous Olivia Ponton but the two have not confirmed their relationship yet. Many people have continued to troll Olivia Ponton and tease the two but they have remained tight lipped.Joe Burrow and Olivia Ponton continue to follow each other on social media despite not opening up to the media. The last time he opened up about his dating life was when he was with his previous girlfriend. He dated her for a couple of years and they went their separate ways in 2023.Also Read: Taylor Swift has "fresh evidence" against her in Blake Lively and Justin Baldoni drama that is raising new questions
Article Summary: Cincinnati bengals quarterback joe burrow has kept his dating life private. Recently, a picture of him with a woman has gone viral, raising eyebrows. While fans are curious about the woman, there is a bizarre speculation going around that taylor rooks was “previously with” ceedee lamb.

Article Title: JJ Redick cracks hilarious $1 billion joke on LeBron James after another 40-point showdown against Portland Trail Blazers
Article Text:
LeBron James and JJ Redick. Image via: Jonathan Hui-Imagn Images

Los Angeles Lakers

Portland Trail Blazers

JJ Redick

JJ Redick showered praise for LeBron James with a hilarious joke



LeBron James and JJ Redick. Image via: Adam Pantozzi/NBAE via Getty Images

have seemingly bounced back as they have secured a stunning win against theon Thursday night. At 40 years old, on the second night of a back-to-back, the four-time NBA champion, LeBron James delivered a jaw-dropping 40-point performance to lead the Los Angeles Lakers to a 121-112 win over the Portland Trail Blazers. His efforts left Lakers head coachboth stunned and inspired, as he showered James with praise following the game. LeBron James has recently dealt with lingering injuries and only confirmed fit to play hours before tipoff but showed no signs of slowing down. He shot an efficient 14-for-24 from the field, including 4-of-8 from beyond the arc, and added eight rebounds and four assists.Head coach JJ Redick , who has always been a vocal admirer of James’ work ethic and longevity, couldn’t hold back his admiration for the legend. Speaking to reporters in a post-game presser, he shared his honest thoughts on the King’s astonishing performance.“He really just defies anything that's normal, and not just the physical feats and the plays—it’s the mentality,” Redick said. “He is—I believe I saw the other day he's a billionaire—and he's playing on the second night of a back-to-back at 40 after 22 years with every record and every accolade.”Redick continued his witty remark, “And the kids will say that I'm glazing him. He's one of the greatest competitors. [Assistant coach] Nate [McMillan] and I were talking before the game—he's amazing to coach. He brings it every single day, he sets the standard for how you're supposed to approach this craft. That’s to me the most incredible thing—the mindset to do it, get up the next day, do it, over and over again.”James’ ability to maintain this level of excellence post-40 has been undeniably top of the word, according to fan analysts. For two decades, he has maintained his stature as a standout star and forged his legacy with a stunning resume to his name.Additionally, James has just added another milestone in his career. By playing his 1,542nd game, he passed Vince Carter to claim third place on the NBA’s all-time games played list. Now, only Kareem Abdul-Jabbar (1,560) and Robert Parish (1,611) stand ahead of him. The 1 billion-rich athlete (per Forbes) is currently averaging 24.7 points per game, 7.7 rebounds, and 8.9 assists. James also holds the youngest and oldest NBA star to score 40 points in a game.Also Read: Los Angeles Lakers legend LeBron James creates another milestone surpassing Vince Carter A huge part of the Lakers’ success against Portland also came from Austin Reaves in the recent game against the Trail Blazers. Reaves delivered a stellar performance of his own, finishing with 32 points on 9-for-21 shooting.With this victory, the Lakers improved to 33-21 on the season, now sitting firmly in fifth place in the Western Conference.
Article Summary: The los angeles lakers beat the portland trail blazers 121-112 on thursday night. Lebron james scored 40 points on 14-for-24 shooting, including 4-of-8 from beyond the arc. Head coach jj redick showered praise on the four-time nba champion.

Article Title: Magic Johnson shares a heartfelt birthday message for his oldest son Andre Johnson: “You’ve made me so proud”
Article Text:
Andre Johnson and Magic Johnson. Image via: magicjohnson/ Instagram

Magic Johnson

Andre Johnson

44th birthday

Magic Johnson poured fatherly love for his son Andre Johnson on his 44th Birthday



Magic Johnson and his son Andre Johnson. Image via: magicjohnson/ Instagram

Magic Johnson recently celebrated Valentine’s Day with his wife Cookie Johnson



NBA legendhas spent decades captivating fans with his incredible skills on the court, but his greatest pride lies in his family. Recently, the five-time NBA champion took to social media to celebrate the special occasion of his firstborn,as he celebrated his. The NBA Hall of Gamer shared a heartfelt message with photos of the duo sharing their father-son moments.On February 20, Magic Johnson paid tribute to his eldest son, Andre, with an emotional Instagram post. Andre, who has forged his own path outside of basketball, has built a successful career in business and entrepreneurship. After acquiring experience at Magic Johnson Enterprises , he went on to become the executive vice president of business development at SimWin Sports and co-hosts the podcast Please Elaborate.Magic’s birthday tribute was filled with warmth and admiration, as he shared a nostalgic series of photos that captured their journey together over the years. The post featured a young Andre as a child, followed by snapshots of father and son in different phases of life.Alongside the photos, Magic expressed his pride and love in a touching caption: “Happy Birthday to my oldest son Andre! You’ve made me so proud of the man, husband, father, and entrepreneur that you’ve become. I can’t wait to see how you continue to evolve over this next year of life. I love you!”Fans were quick to react, praising the Lakers legend for being such a dedicated father. Magic has always been vocal about his love for his children and his wife supporting his family on different occasions.While Magic’s love as a father is undeniable, his devotion as a husband is just as inspiring. The Hall of Famer and business mogul has been married to Cookie Johnson for over 30 years, and their bond remains as strong as ever. As the world celebrated Valentine’s Day, Magic took the opportunity to express his gratitude for his lifelong partner.Sharing a beautifully curated video montage of their memories together, Magic wrote a heartfelt caption that touched the hearts of many: “Through every season of life, you’ve been my greatest blessing. After 40+ years, I’m still in awe of you and thank God everyday that I get to call you mine. To my love Cookie, Happy Valentine’s Day! ❤️”Cookie, equally devoted to their love story, responded with her own moving tribute: “After all these years, you are still the one who makes my heart smile! My forever Valentine, my greatest gift from God, and my love for a lifetime. I love you, Earvin! 🥰❤️” To which Magic affectionately replied, “My forever valentine. I love you!”Also Read: Magic Johnson reacts to Kendrick Lamar’s Super Bowl halftime show amid buzz over controversial Drake diss Magic Johnson’s dedication to his family has always been the headline grabber with fans pouring support for the NBA legend’s kind heart. He has been a devoted husband and father to his kids as the NBA legend never hesitated to show his love for his family on his social media.
Article Summary: Magic johnson shared a touching tribute to his son andre on his 44th birthday. The nba legend has always been vocal about his love for his children and his wife. The hall of famer has been married to cookie johnson for over 30 years.

Article Title: Will Kevin Durant play tonight against the Chicago Bulls? Latest update on the Phoenix Suns star's injury report (February 22, 2025)
Article Text:
Is Kevin Durant playing tonight? (Image via Getty Images)

Phoenix Suns

Kevin Durant

Is Kevin Durant playing tonight? Phoenix Suns injury report for tonight’s game against the Chicago Bulls (February 22, 2025)

Suns injury report Feb 22 (Image via NBA)

When and where to watch the Phoenix Suns game tonight (February 22, 2025)?

Theare gearing up for a crucial matchup against the Chicago Bulls on Saturday, February 22, at the United Center, but all eyes are on’s status as the team navigates its injury concerns. Durant, a cornerstone of the Suns’ offense, has been a consistent force this season, averaging 23 points, 4.4 rebounds, and 3.9 assists over the last 20 games. However, his health remains a focal point as Phoenix looks to stay competitive in the Western Conference playoff race.As of now, Kevin Durant is not listed on the Phoenix Suns’ injury report, signaling that the 14-time All-Star is expected to suit up against the Bulls. This is a significant boost for Phoenix, especially with Cody Martin ruled out due to an abdominal injury. Durant’s presence on the court is critical for the Suns, who rank 14th in the league with 113.1 points per game but struggle defensively, allowing 115.1 points per outing.The Suns’ reliance on Kevin Durant is evident. Alongside Devin Booker , who leads the team with 26.8 points per game, Durant’s scoring and playmaking have been instrumental in keeping Phoenix afloat. His ability to stretch the floor, hitting 2.1 three-pointers per game, adds another dimension to the Suns’ offense. Without him, the team’s chances of overcoming a Bulls squad fighting for consistency would take a major hit.On the other side, the Bulls are dealing with their own injury woes. Nikola Vucevic (calf) is listed as probable, while Patrick Williams (knee) and Jalen Smith (face) are out. Josh Giddey (wrist) is probable, and Ayo Dosunmu (shoulder) is questionable. Despite these setbacks, Chicago remains a threat, ranking 10th in the NBA with 115.9 points per game. Vucevic, averaging 19.2 points and 10.3 rebounds, will be a key player to watch if he’s cleared to play.For Phoenix, Kevin Durant’s availability is more than just a lineup decision—it’s a statement of intent. As the Phoenix Suns aim to climb the standings, his health and performance will be pivotal. Fans can catch the action live at 5:00 PM ET on CHSN, AZFamily, or via Fubo, where regional restrictions may apply.Also read: Will LeBron James play tonight against the Denver Nuggets? Latest update on the Los Angeles Lakers star's injury report (February 22, 2025) With Durant expected to play, the Suns have a fighting chance to secure a much-needed win. But in a season riddled with challenges, his ability to stay on the court could ultimately define Phoenix’s playoff aspirations.
Article Summary: Kevin durant is not listed on the phoenix suns’ injury report, signaling that the 14-time all-star is expected to suit up against the bulls. This is a significant boost for phoenix, especially with cody martin ruled out due to an abdominal injury.

NEW DELHI: India and Pakistan are set to clash in a high-stakes ICC Champions Trophy encounter on Sunday, with both teams chasing different objectives. India, buoyed by their six-wicket win over Bangladesh, look to secure a semifinal berth, while Pakistan, reeling from a 60-run defeat to New Zealand, must win to stay in contention.The two arch-rivals last met in a Champions Trophy match in 2017, when Pakistan triumphed in the final.Although diplomatic tensions have eased, muting the usual fervor, anticipation remains high for this Group A showdown at the Dubai International Cricket Stadium.India hold a clear advantage, having acclimatized to the conditions, while Pakistan arrive in Dubai straight after their loss to New Zealand in Karachi. With form and familiarity on their side, India head into Sunday’s clash with a psychological edge.The Champions Trophy clash between India and Pakistan at the Dubai International Cricket Stadium on February 23 is expected to proceed without any rain interruption, despite rainfall occurring in Dubai days before India's tournament opener.The forecast indicates partly cloudy conditions during afternoon hours, with temperatures ranging between 23 degrees Celsius at its lowest and reaching up to 31 degrees Celsius at its peak.31 DegreesMostly sunny and warm20 km/h5%32 DegreesMostly sunny and warm30 km/h23%26 DegreesPartly cloudy and warm24 km/h100%The playing surface at the Dubai International Stadium provides opportunities for both batting and bowling, with conditions that can fluctuate. During day/night contests, as the surface becomes drier, spin bowlers often find increased effectiveness. The initial phase favours pace bowling, with the potential for movement in the air and bounce off the surface. Whilst scoring opportunities exist, as evidenced by typical first innings totals, the venue does not consistently yield substantial scores.Spin bowling proves particularly crucial during the middle phase, as the surface tends to assist turn. Pace bowlers find value with the new ball, extracting movement and lift. In day/night fixtures, the presence of dew can be influential in the toss decision.Rohit Sharma (c), Shubman Gill (vc), Virat Kohli, Shreyas Iyer, KL Rahul (wk), Hardik Pandya, Axar Patel, Washington Sundar, Kuldeep Yadav, Jasprit Bumrah, Mohammed Shami, Arshdeep Singh, Harshit Rana, Rishabh Pant (wk), Ravindra Jadeja, Varun Chakaravarthy.Mohammad Rizwan (c, wk), Salman Ali Agha (vc), Babar Azam, Fakhar Zaman, Kamran Ghulam, Saud Shakeel, Tayyab Tahir, Faheem Ashraf, Khushdil Shah, Usman Khan, Abrar Ahmed, Haris Rauf, Mohammad Hasnain, Naseem Shah, Shaheen Shah Afridi.
Article Summary: India and pakistan face each other in a high-stakes icc champions trophy encounter on sunday. The two arch-rivals last met in a champions trophy match in 2017, when pakistan triumphed in the final. India hold a clear advantage, having acclimatized to the conditions, while pakistan arrive in dubai straight after their loss to new zealand in karachi.

Article Title: 'He can single-handedly win you the game': Yuvraj Singh backs Rohit Sharma ahead of India vs Pakistan Champions Trophy clash
Article Text:
Rohit Sharma (PTI Photo)

Poll Will Rohit Sharma's Performance Be the Deciding Factor in the India vs Pakistan ICC Champions Trophy Clash? No, Pakistan Has a Strong Team Too Yes, He's a Game-Changer

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Pakistan team trains ahead of Champions Trophy clash vs India | EXCLUSIVE VISUALS

Mohammed Shami: 'I just go for wickets; don't care about the economy rate at all'

NEW DELHI: As the much-awaited India-Pakistan showdown in the ICC Champions Trophy approaches, former Indian cricketer Yuvraj Singh has backed Indian captain Rohit Sharma , calling him a "dangerous" player even when not in peak form.The arch-rivals will face off in Dubai on Sunday in a match that holds historical significance, with Pakistan leading 3-2 against India in Champions Trophy encounters.Speaking on JioHotstar’s 'Greatest Rivalry Returns', Yuvraj emphasised Rohit's ability to change the course of a game, irrespective of his form.“In ODIs and white-ball formats, he has been India’s biggest match-winner alongside Virat Kohli . If he is struggling but still gets runs, that is dangerous for the opposition. If he is in form, he will score a century in 60 balls. That is his quality — once he gets going, it’s not just about fours, but also clearing the ropes with sixes,” Yuvraj said.He also praised Rohit’s dominance against pace, particularly short-pitched bowling, which is often a concern for batters. “Even if someone bowls at 145-150 kmph, Rohit has the ability to hook it effortlessly. His strike rate is always between 120-140, and on his day, he can single-handedly win you the game,” he added.Rohit has a stellar record against Pakistan, scoring 873 runs in 19 ODIs at an average of 51.35, with two centuries and eight fifties. His highest score of 140 came in the 2019 World Cup.Pakistan, coming off a disappointing tournament opener against New Zealand, will be eager to repeat their 2017 Champions Trophy final triumph over India.However, with Rohit leading the charge, India, who beat Bangladesh in their opening game, will look to level the head-to-head record in the prestigious tournament.
Article Summary: Former indian cricketer yuvraj singh has backed indian captain rohit sharma. The arch-rivals will face off in dubai on sunday in a match that holds historical significance, with pakistan leading 3-2 against india in champions trophy encounters. Pakistan will be eager to repeat their 2017 champions trophy final triumph over india.

Article Title: India vs Pakistan: 'Ab Pakistan mei TV nahi tootenge kyuki...'
Article Text:
ANI Photo

Poll What Is the Most Exciting Part of a Champions Trophy Match? Electrifying Atmosphere Intense Rivalries

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Pakistan team trains ahead of Champions Trophy clash vs India | EXCLUSIVE VISUALS

After a defeat in the tournament opener, Pakistan's hopes of progressing in the Champions Trophy hinge heavily on their next group match against traditional rivals India in Dubai on Sunday, which former Pakistan cricketer Basit Ali views as heavily loaded in favour of India.New Zealand outclassed defending champions and hosts Pakistan by 60 runs in the first match of the tournament at Karachi, while India beat Bangladesh by six wickets in Dubai.Talking about Pakistan's chances and their must-win situation, Basit said it will be a big upset if Pakistan get the better of India."It is a 'final' for Pakistan," the former batter said on his YouTube channel. "India are heavy favourites. If Pakistan win, it will be an upset in my view because Pakistan's cricket has gone down, hit a low."Agar one-sided hota hai, toh ab TV bhi nahi tootenge kyuki Pakistan mei mehangai boht zyada hai. Ab zabaan se hi har cheez hogi (if Pakistan lose one-sided, now fans wont' break TV sets because of the country's economic situation; now there will be only voiced opinions)."The hosts suffered a blow after the defeat against the Kiwis, losing their attacking batter Fakhar Zaman to injury, which led to Imam-ul-Haq coming in as replacement"Who will bat at No. 3, nobody knows. They might ask Usman Khan to open with Imam and bring Babar (Azam) at No. 3. Something needs to be done," Basit added, talking about the team's dire state.Babar has been opening since the ODI tri-series at home ahead of the Champions Trophy and was criticised for his laborious 64 off 90 balls in the first match of the Champions Trophy despite a target of 321 to chase."Fakhar Zaman is out. Now Pakistan's batting line-up from number one to five is similar and there is no scope to swap positions. It's true. If their car is running in third gear, then it will stay in third gear. It won't be able to switch to turbo, maybe in the last 5 or 10 overs, maybe," said Basit.India, meanwhile, put up an all-round show against Bangladesh to start their campaign on a rousing note, with Mohammed Shami shining with a five-wicket spell (5 for 53) and opener Shubman Gill scoring an unbeaten century (101*).Basit said India will continue to play normal cricket and take it like just another match, while the mentality in Pakistan is still to beat India at any cost."Baaton ki cricket ab nahi hone chahiye, ab bat se, dimag se (Pakistan now need to make their bats talk, use their brain)," he said.Captain Rohit Sharma, who scored a century during the ODI series at home against England to return to form, looked good in his 36-ball 41 against Bangladesh, while Virat Kohli had to struggle for his 22, which came off 38 balls."Virat intezar karta hai Pakistan ke match ka (Virat waits for the match against Pakistan)," said Basit, predicting that the batting legend may play a big knock in the pressure match.He concluded by criticising the Pakistan Cricket Board for the money it spent in refurbishing the three stadiums in Lahore, Karachi and Rawalpindi.He said the board should instead have applied its mind in building a team."The amount of money they spent in building the stadiums, they could have built a good team in half that amount. But to build a team you need intelligence. What is your vision? What's your thinking? How do you view a player's talent and longevity? These things matter."As things stand at the moment in Group A, New Zealand are on top with two points, with India at No.2 because the Kiwis have a better net run-rate (NRR) of +1.200 compared to India's +0.408.Bangladesh are ahead of bottom-placed Pakistan. Both the teams are without any points, while Bangladesh's NRR of -0.408 is better than Pakistan's -1.200.
Article Summary: Basit ali says it will be a big upset if pakistan get the better of india. The former pakistan cricketer says india are heavy favourites to win the match. He criticises the pakistan cricket board for the money spent in refurbishing the stadiums. Bangladesh are ahead of bottom-placed pakistan.

Article Title: Champions Trophy: Why former Indian cricketer wants Pakistan to win blockbuster clash
Article Text:
Pakistan team trains ahead of Champions Trophy clash vs India | EXCLUSIVE VISUALS

NEW DELHI: When former cricketer Atul Wassan announced that he wants Pakistan to defeat India in Sunday's Champions Trophy match in Dubai, it caught everyone off guard.Pakistan will take on fierce opponents India in the duel of the heavyweights in an attempt to maintain their championship defense. After losing to New Zealand by 60 runs in the opening match of the competition, Pakistan ended up in this situation.The Men in Green would require a lot of different combinations to work in their favor and sustain their campaign if they lose against India on Sunday. Wassan thinks that if Pakistan wins the crucial match, the competition will become much more thrilling."I want Pakistan to win because it will be fun, tournament-wise. If you don't let Pakistan win, then what will you do? If Pakistan wins, then it becomes a contest. There should be an equal fight," Wassan told ANI.Wassan praised India's batting depth in the starting line-up while analyzing their team for the current Champions Trophy. He believed that India was the greatest squad and supported their plan to launch a spin-heavy attack in Dubai given the circumstances."You have a lot of good batters: Shubman (Gill), Rohit (Sharma), Virat (Kohli). You are batting until number eight in Axar Patel. Rohit has picked five spinners, and this team is best for Dubai. Have faith in what you have and move ahead," he added.India glided to a facile six-wicket victory against Bangladesh to open their account, while Pakistan started the campaign on a losing note.However, Wassan voiced his displeasure at Rishabh Pant 's exclusion from India's starting XI in favor of KL Rahul . Wassan believes that Pant makes the opposition uneasy, something Rahul cannot do.Head coach Gautam Gambhir 's preference for Rahul over Pant did not impress Wassan. He claims that the "mercurial" player has been let down by the Indian management, which could have long-term consequences for him."Gautam Gambhir is picking his own team. I am just very upset that Rishabh Pant is not playing. I don't know why. He's a mercurial player who makes the other team nervous. They feel that he will single-handedly win the match. KL Rahul is a very good player but does not attract such fear from the opposition. You let Rishabh Pant down. If you let a good player enter this situation that he won't play, the hero in him becomes zero," Wassan said.
Article Summary: Former cricketer atul wassan wants pakistan to defeat india in champions trophy match in dubai. Pakistan lost to new zealand by 60 runs in the opening match of the competition. Wassan voiced his displeasure at rishabh pant's exclusion from india's starting xi in favor of kl rahul.

Article Title: Champions Trophy: Babar Azam is being rightly criticised, says Rashid Latif
Article Text: NEW DELHI: Former Pakistan batter Rashid Latif criticized former captain Babar Azam for his tactics during the Champions Trophy opener against New Zealand in Karachi, where the hosts lost by 60 runs on the ICC tournament's first visit to the nation since 1996.Even though Salman Agha and Kushdil Shah hit fast-paced 42 and 69, respectively, Babar contributed 64 in 90 balls while chasing 321, the team was unable to win the tournament opener.Concerns about Babar's low strike rate in the high-scoring chase were voiced by Pakistani supporters and veteran cricket players following the game. Latif said that the criticism was justified and that Babar ought to have taken chances while he was at the crease."I think Babar Azam is being rightly criticised. If the ball is not coming onto the bat then you should have a Plan B. If you keep racking up the dot balls then you add pressure onto the team. Babar should have taken more risks, I believe the opening ten overs were there to take risks, as they struggle to play freely against spin. People think Pakistan have been unpredictable but Babar's batting has become predictable," Latif told IANS.The former wicketkeeper-batter went on to say that Babar is no longer Pakistan's best chance, citing Virat Kohli as an example who gained international acclaim for his clutch scoring for India."Bowlers always know what shot he will play against which ball. Babar used to be Pakistan's hope at one time but not anymore as there are other players who can do (better). If on a day when Virat Kohli does not perform then Shubman Gill will perform, if he does not then Rohit is there, you've got Shreyas Iyer Hardik Pandya and KL Rahul as well but Virat is a big game player, he played a crucial innings in the T20 World Cup final (2024) as well," he added.Latif stated that the Mohammad Rizwan-led team appears weaker against Rohit Sharma & Co. ahead of Sunday's crucial match between India and Pakistan in Dubai."If we look at both teams then Pakistan's side looks weak. Even though India's record has been stronger against Pakistan but there used to be competition, the game used to go till the final overs. People think India's tournaments have usually been due to their batting but Pakistan's success has always been due to their bowling," he said."This match is very important for Pakistan. I am not worried for just the Champions Trophy but for Pakistan cricket as well because a lot of things were said and written in the build-up to the tournament (regarding India's participation) but all of that was off the field now the cricket has started and Pakistan lost their opening game whereas India won theirs. In a tournament like CT, where every team is a top side, the margins of errors are less there. Pakistan had lost their opening game in 2017 as well."Despite pace-spearhead Jasprit Bumrah 's absence, the seasoned hitter termed India's bowling arsenal better than Pakistan."I believe India's bowling is currently better, I know Jasprit Bumrah is not here, but their spinners are dominating, and in conditions like Dubai, Pakistan will struggle to face their spin attack," Latif said.
Article Summary: Former pakistan batter rashid latif criticizes babar azam for tactics in champions trophy opener against new zealand. Latif says babar's batting has become predictable and that he is no longer pakistan's best chance. He says the mohammad rizwan-led team appears weaker against india ahead of sunday's crucial match in dubai.

secured a hard-earnedoverat Golden 1 Center, Sacramento on February 21. The high-octane game featured several Warriors stars posting astonishing scores on the board including Stephen Curry . While the Kings struggled, DeMar DeRozan showed a wonderful performance adding 34 points to the team’s total. Here are the box score, player stats, game summary, and more about the Golden State Warriors vs Sacramento Kings matchup.The Golden State Warriors made a strong statement in their 132-106 victory over the Sacramento Kings on Friday night. Buddy Hield and Moses Moody led the charge with 22 points each, while Brandin Podziemski added 21 and Stephen Curry chipped in 20. The Warriors’ supporting cast stepped up in a big way, punishing a Kings team that struggled on both ends of the floor.Sacramento, now sitting at 28-28 and barely clinging to the final Play-In spot, couldn’t keep up with Golden State’s sharp shooting. The Warriors built a 20-point lead in the second quarter and never looked back, hitting 11 three-pointers in the first half to take a 68-53 advantage into the break. By the time the fourth quarter arrived, Golden State held a comfortable 100-83 lead.Also Read: Detroit Pistons vs San Antonio Spurs (02/21): Box score, player stats, game summary, and more DeMar DeRozan led the Kings with 34 points, while Domantas Sabonis fell just short of a triple-double with 14 points, 14 rebounds, and nine assists. Markelle Fultz, making his Sacramento debut, contributed eight points.

Article Title: “Reel Sultan vs Real Sultan” Salman Khan meets UFC legend Khabib Nurmagomedov in Dubai, internet loses it
Article Text:
Image via Instagram/Shera

“Two legends, one frame!”

Sultan

Khabib Nurmagomedov’s love for Bollywood and why he is a massive Shah Rukh Khan fan

“Like Indian movies, like Bollywood. Of course, I watch,”

Pathaan, Jawan

Dunki

Khabib Nurmagomedov remains an undefeated UFC legend, while Salman Khan’s next big film arrives this Eid

Sikandar

Bollywood and combat sports don’t usually mix, but when they do, the internet goes wild. Salman Khan and Khabib Nurmagomedov—two absolute icons in their own spaces—met in Dubai , and fans haven’t stopped talking about it.Salman’s bodyguard, Shera, shared a photo of the two on Instagram with the caption,That was enough to send social media into a frenzy. Fans of both stars rushed to comment, some hyping up the crossover, others making jokes about Salman’s on-screen MMA stint invs. Khabib’s actual, undefeated fighting career. Either way, the photo spread like wildfire.Most know Khabib Nurmagomedov for his dominance in the octagon, but fewer know he’s a huge Bollywood fan. In a 2022 podcast, Khabib admitted he watches Indian movies and even has a favorite actor.he said before revealing that Shah Rukh Khan is his top pick.For a guy who spent years smashing opponents inside the UFC cage, Khabib’s softer side surprises many. His admiration for Bollywood, especially Shah Rukh Khan, adds another layer to his personality—one that contrasts with the intense, no-nonsense fighter the world saw in the octagon.Shah Rukh Khan, often called the "King of Bollywood," has a fanbase that stretches far beyond India, and Khabib is proof of that. At the time of Khabib’s viral interview, Shah Rukh was on a break from films, but fans were eagerly waiting for his comeback with, andKhabib Nurmagomedov walked away from MMA in 2020 with an untouchable 29-0 record. His final fight, a submission victory over Justin Gaethje at UFC 254, cemented his legacy as one of the greatest fighters in the sport’s history. Since retiring, he has focused on coaching and promoting, guiding his protégé, Islam Makhachev, to UFC gold. He also runs Eagle Fighting Championship (EFC), making moves outside the cage while still staying close to the fight game.Salman Khan, on the other hand, remains one of Bollywood’s most bankable stars. His next big release,, hits theaters on Eid, with Rashmika Mandanna as his co-star. There’s also buzz about him working on a Hollywood project in Saudi Arabia, but nothing has been confirmed yet.The Khabib-Salman meetup might not mean much beyond a viral photo, but it’s proof of how global fanbases collide. Whether you're into Bollywood or MMA, seeing two legends in the same frame is always going to get people talking.
Article Summary: Khabib nurmagomedov and salman khan met in dubai. A photo of the two together went viral on social media. Khabib admitted he watches bollywood movies and has a favorite actor. He said shah rukh khan is his top pick.

Article Title: Champions Trophy: Why Pakistan will be under more pressure in clash against India
Article Text: NEW DELHI: Pakistan will play bitter rivals India in a Champions Trophy thriller on Sunday in front of a sold-out crowd in Dubai knowing that another loss would all but end their championship defense.Due to political sensitivities, the neighbors only clash in multi-nation events. This match is being played in Dubai after India declined to travel to Pakistan, the tournament's host nation.Pakistan will be under pressure in front of an anticipated full house at the 25,000-seat Dubai International Stadium, with hundreds of millions more people riveted to their TVs.Realistically, Mohammad Rizwan 's team needs to defeat favorites India in order to go to the semi-finals of the eight-nation event after losing badly to New Zealand by 60 runs in the first match of the ODI competition in Karachi.On a higher run-rate, New Zealand leads Group A ahead of India, who defeated Bangladesh by six wickets on Thursday. Pakistan sits at the bottom of the group, in fourth place.The semi-finals will be played by the top two teams in each of the two groups."If we want to win against the great teams of the world and be one of the great teams of the world we will have to bring consistency," Pakistan batsman Salman Ali Agha said."We can't play well in one game and bad in another."Last week in a tri-nation event at home, Pakistan lost to New Zealand in the final, crashing to 242 all out after chasing down a record 353 against South Africa.Their top batsman, Fakhar Zaman , sustained a muscular injury on Wednesday, which dealt them a serious blow in the defeat. He has been ruled out of the tournament.Also See: India vs Pakistan Head to Head Records Imam-ul-Haq came in as replacement for a team that hammered India in the final of the previous Champions Trophy , in 2017.Since that last ODI loss to Pakistan, Rohit Sharma 's team has defeated their fiercest opponents five times in a row, with one match being rained off.The last time they played each other, India won by seven wickets in a one-day match at the 2023 World Cup in Ahmedabad.The tournament, Pakistan's first ICC event since co-hosting the 1996 World Cup with India and Sri Lanka, would be ruined by another defeat and an early exit for the hosts.India, on the other hand, played up to their reputation as favorites when they defeated Bangladesh in Dubai, chasing down a challenging 229 with 21 balls remaining.Following the return of bowling stats of 5-53 from pace spearhead Mohammed Shami , in-form Shubman Gill scored an undefeated 101 for his second consecutive ODI century.India would be on the verge of the final four if they win against Pakistan."After winning there is no point in having a mindset," a confident-looking Shami said in response to a question on facing Pakistan next."You should stay in the same frame (habit) when you win a match and when you perform well. I don't think you need to think too much about the ICC tournament or any international match."The same confidence was displayed by fellow pace bowler Harshit Rana, who took three wickets in his team's victory."It's great to perform ahead of the Pakistan match and hopefully I can take this momentum forward," said Rana. "But the Pakistan match is just another game for us."
Article Summary: Pakistan play bitter rivals india in a champions trophy thriller on sunday. The neighbors only clash in multi-nation events due to political sensitivities. Pakistan lost to new zealand by 60 runs in the first match of the odi competition. India defeated bangladesh by six wickets on thursday.
